posts.title: Doctor Who | Twelfth Doctor Tribute - My Way
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: A tribute to the wonderful Twelfth Doctor, played by Peter Capaldi, who is leaving Doctor Who this Christmas. Please enjoy. Clips used are from Doctor Who Series 7-10. Music - 'My Way' by Frank Sinatra. Intro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://www.youtube.com/user/tumblegamer Outro music: 'Breaking the Wall' by Murray Gold. Clean version courtesy of Oswin Pond: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoGta1RGhUECqSVfJ8PX0wg Watch it here

posts.title: The Walking Dead rescore - Shiva saves Carl
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: The scene from The Walking Dead Season 7 finale in which Shiva saves Carl, rescored to 'Why Do We Fall?' from The Dark Knight Rises soundtrack by Hans Zimmer and James Newton Howard. Please enjoy. Intro music - 'The Rains of Castamere' by The National (From Game of Thrones) Outro music - 'The Only Way' by Bear McCreary (From The Walking Dead) Intro logo and outro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://www.youtube.com/user/tumblegamer Ripped Walking Dead soundtrack courtesy of B.Claimed: https://www.youtube.com/user/BILLYISAZOMBIE99 Watch it here
posts.content: The scene from The Walking Dead Season 7 finale in which Shiva saves Carl, rescored to 'Why Do We Fall?' from The Dark Knight Rises soundtrack by Hans Zimmer and James Newton Howard. Please enjoy. Intro music - 'The Rains of Castamere' by The National (From Game of Thrones) Outro music - 'The Only Way' by Bear McCreary (From The Walking Dead) Intro logo and outro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://www.youtube.com/user/tumblegamer Ripped Walking Dead soundtrack courtesy of B.Claimed: https://www.youtube.com/user/BILLYISAZOMBIE99 Watch it here

posts.title: The Walking Dead edit - Negan kills Rick immediately
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: An edit of the Negan scenes from The Walking Dead 6x16 and 7x01, in which Negan arrives and immediately kills Rick. Please enjoy. Intro music: 'The Rains of Castamere' by the National (From 'Game of Thrones'). Outro music: 'Just Getting Started' by Bear McCreary (From 'The Walking Dead'). Logos, intro and outro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://www.youtube.com/user/tumblegamer NOTE: It was difficult to edit in Negan's 'I will kill you', so it might sound like 'we'll kill you', which works just as well. Watch it here
posts.content: An edit of the Negan scenes from The Walking Dead 6x16 and 7x01, in which Negan arrives and immediately kills Rick. Please enjoy. Intro music: 'The Rains of Castamere' by the National (From 'Game of Thrones'). Outro music: 'Just Getting Started' by Bear McCreary (From 'The Walking Dead'). Logos, intro and outro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://www.youtube.com/user/tumblegamer NOTE: It was difficult to edit in Negan's 'I will kill you', so it might sound like 'we'll kill you', which works just as well. posts.title: If Pirates of the Caribbean were Chicken Run #2 - Opening credits (Pirates of the Caribbean rescore)
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: What if Pirates of the Caribbean were made by Aardman Animations? In this next video, the opening credits of 'Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides' is rescored with 'Opening Escape' from the 'Chicken Run soundtrack. Please enjoy. Intro music: 'The Rains of Castamere' from 'Game of Thrones.' Outro music: 'You Win or You Die' from 'Game of Thrones.' All logos courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://www.youtube.com/user/tumblegamer Watch it here

posts.title: If Pirates of the Caribbean were Chicken Run #1 - Pirates of the Caribbean rescore
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: This is the first in a new series of videos. What if 'Pirates of the Carribean' were made by Aardman Studios? In this first video, King Elizabeth's famous speech from 'At World's End' is rescored with 'Building the Crate' and 'The Chickens are Revolting' from the Chicken Run soundtrack, composed by Harry Gregson-Williams. Please enjoy. Credits music - 'Main Titles' from 'Chicken Run': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oUDCbOVmSdU Watch it here

posts.title: Wallace and Gromit The Curse of the Were Rabbit - Circus for a Psycho (Tribute video)
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: A tribute video for the amazing film 'Wallace and Gromit: The Curse of the Were Rabbit', set to Skillet's 'Circus for a Psycho.' It aims to capture the conflict between Wallace and Victor Quartermaine, as well as the results of Wallace's failed experiment that turned him into the Were-Rabbit and Hutch into a rabbit version of himself. Please enjoy. Logos, intro and outro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://youtube.com/tumblegamer Watch it here
posts.content: A tribute video for the amazing film 'Wallace and Gromit: The Curse of the Were Rabbit', set to Skillet's 'Circus for a Psycho.' It aims to capture the conflict between Wallace and Victor Quartermaine, as well as the results of Wallace's failed experiment that turned him into the Were-Rabbit and Hutch into a rabbit version of himself. Please enjoy. Logos, intro and outro courtesy of TumbleGamer: https://youtube.com/tumblegamer Watch it here

posts.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
posts.author: tumblegamer
posts.excerpt: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.
posts.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext. Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo.

posts.title: Pirates of the Caribbean - Davy Jones Organ Suite (Hans Zimmer)
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: A suite of Davy Jones playing the organ from Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean film series and composed by Hans Zimmer. Track list: 0:10-2:25 - Davy Jones Plays His Organ (Version 1) (From Dead Man's Chest) 2:26-3:10 - A Game of Liar's Dice (From Dead Man's Chest) 3:11-4:31 - Davy Jones Plays His Organ (Version 2) (From Dead Man's Chest) 4:32-5:11 - At Wit's End (From At World's End) 5:12-5:32 - I See Dead People In Boats (Excerpt) (From At World's End) Credits music - 'The Rains of Castamere - Red Wedding Edition' (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ygcff7xaZfk) Please enjoy. Watch it here
posts.content: A suite of Davy Jones playing the organ from Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean film series and composed by Hans Zimmer. Track list: 0:10-2:25 - Davy Jones Plays His Organ (Version 1) (From Dead Man's Chest) 2:26-3:10 - A Game of Liar's Dice (From Dead Man's Chest) 3:11-4:31 - Davy Jones Plays His Organ (Version 2) (From Dead Man's Chest) 4:32-5:11 - At Wit's End (From At World's End) 5:12-5:32 - I See Dead People In Boats (Excerpt) (From At World's End) Credits music - 'The Rains of Castamere - Red Wedding Edition' (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ygcff7xaZfk) Please enjoy. posts.title: Game of Thrones rescored - Jon Snow retakes Winterfell
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt: This is something I saw recommended in comment sections. The scene where Jon and Sansa defeat Ramsay Bolton at the Battle of the Bastards and replace his banners at their newly retaken home of Winterfell with House Stark banners, rescored with 'King of the North' from the Season 1 soundtrack. Footage is from Game of Thrones Season 6 Episode 9, 'Battle of the Bastards.' My intro music is 'The Rains of Castamere'. The music used for the outro is 'Goodbye Brother.' Both are from Game of Thrones. Please enjoy. Watch it here

posts.title: Portal Stories: Mel
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt:
[caption id="attachment_440" align="alignnone" width="300"] Virgil from the game[/caption]

Portal Stories: Mel is a classy mod! Valve quality! It's a game in its own right. The puzzles are difficult but it's a must for Portal enthusiasts.
posts.content:
[caption id="attachment_440" align="alignnone" width="300"] Virgil from the game[/caption]

Portal Stories: Mel is a classy mod! Valve quality! It's a game in its own right. The puzzles are difficult but it's a must for Portal enthusiasts.

posts.title: Join us!
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt:
Hello,

[caption id="attachment_435" align="alignright" width="293"] The TumbleCraft house.[/caption]

Tumble has a Minecraft server (When he can get it to work) that we play on called TumbleCraft. The picture shows our house. This is a great place for the TumbleGamer community to play Minecraft as a group. Join us! Our usernames are Tumble1999 and DrBatmanWho. We hope to see you at TumbleCraft.
posts.content:
Hello,

[caption id="attachment_435" align="alignright" width="293"] The TumbleCraft house.[/caption]

Tumble has a Minecraft server (When he can get it to work) that we play on called TumbleCraft. The picture shows our house. This is a great place for the TumbleGamer community to play Minecraft as a group. Join us! Our usernames are Tumble1999 and DrBatmanWho. We hope to see you at TumbleCraft.

posts.title: Update
posts.author: doctorbatmanwho
posts.excerpt:
Hello,

So Tumble has linked everything to Minecraft - brilliant idea! I like it. So I am DrBatmanWho, which is my minecraft username. Want to play with me? I can be found on a server with Tumble and Mineplex!

About my channel - I have some new videos coming up! There will be the sequel to 'Funny Wheatley, 'Funny Evil Wheatley, the sequel to 'The Wheatley Suite', 'The GLaDOS Suite', some rescores and a channel trailer. I will keep posting here on this website because it's great.

Minecraft - brilliant idea.
posts.content:
Hello,

So Tumble has linked everything to Minecraft - brilliant idea! I like it. So I am DrBatmanWho, which is my minecraft username. Want to play with me? I can be found on a server with Tumble and Mineplex!

About my channel - I have some new videos coming up! There will be the sequel to 'Funny Wheatley, 'Funny Evil Wheatley, the sequel to 'The Wheatley Suite', 'The GLaDOS Suite', some rescores and a channel trailer. I will keep posting here on this website because it's great.

Minecraft - brilliant idea.

posts.content: Today we have a newsletter setup to tell you the latest news on the Tumblegamer website.

posts.title: How to get a website domain for free | Freenom.com
posts.author: tumblegamer
posts.excerpt:
Want to know how we got our domain free?


You may see in our url is a no hosting service. (e.g."*.webs.com", "*.wix.com/*",  "*.wordpress.com"), and you may (or may not) be wonering how we did that with out spending any money.

Well...


We found a site called Freenom.com.

This site is really good they offer domains tat are free, only some of them are3 free, but the ones that are free are good enough.

These include;

  • .tk

  • .ml

  • .ga

  • .cf

  • .gq


All you do is type in the web address you want, click check availability and there will be a list of domains to choose from. The site doesn't just offer free domains it also offers costly ones to. Check out the price chart here.
posts.content:
Want to know how we got our domain free?


You may see in our url is a no hosting service. (e.g."*.webs.com", "*.wix.com/*",  "*.wordpress.com"), and you may (or may not) be wonering how we did that with out spending any money.

Well...


We found a site called Freenom.com.

This site is really good they offer domains tat are free, only some of them are3 free, but the ones that are free are good enough.

These include;

  • .tk

  • .ml

  • .ga

  • .cf

  • .gq


All you do is type in the web address you want, click check availability and there will be a list of domains to choose from. The site doesn't just offer free domains it also offers costly ones to. Check out the price chart here.

posts.title: FREE ESHOP MONEY!!!
posts.author: tumblegamer
posts.excerpt: want to have free eshop points...well now you can with 3DS pedia (http://forum.3dspedia.com/)and it was this video that avertised it to meit uses a currency of play coins that you gain from doing cirtain things and...Anywaythis is waht the site says;What are Play Coins and how do I get them? - Play Coins are the virtual currency of 3DS Pedia. It should not be confused with Play Coins from the Nintendo 3DS. At the 3DS Pedia Forum, members can earn Play Coins by replying to topics and starting new
posts.content:
want to have free eshop points...
well now you can with 3DS pedia (http://forum.3dspedia.com/)
and it was this video that avertised it to me
it uses a currency of play coins that you gain from doing cirtain things and...Anyway
this is waht the site says;
What are Play Coins and how do I get them? - Play Coins are the virtual currency of 3DS Pedia. It should not be confused with Play Coins from the Nintendo 3DS. At the 3DS Pedia Forum, members can earn Play Coins by replying to topics and starting new topics in the forum (more methods are listed below). Once you earn enough Play Coins, you can exchange them for eShop credit or 3DS/Wii U game download codes.
Ways that you can earn Play Coins at 3DS Pedia : - Making quality posts in the discussion forums ("quality" as in putting thought into your post / not short posts). - Participating in contests/tournaments and raffles in the Nookling Junction. - Selling/auctioning 3DS in-game content (e.g Pokemon, Animal Crossing items, etc) in the Nookling Junction. - Battling in Pokemon X/Y or racing in Mario Kart 7/8 for Play Coins (etc). - Selling services (such as EV training or IV breeding services in Pokemon X/Y, graphic designing services, etc). - Referring active posters who make quality posts in the forum (how it works). - Becoming the Member of the Week doubles or triples your earned Play Coins (from posting). - and a lot more by being creative. To learn how to send Play Coins to another member, click here and read this post. Be sure to read the Nookling Junction rules too. Important: - Short or low-quality posts do not earn you Play Coins. - Play Coins are disabled at some forums. - Padding a post with unnecessary content, chain-posting, baiting for chain posts and making unnecessary posts in order to earn more Play Coins is not allowed and in case of such repeated behaviour may result in the offending user's Play Coins system being disabled. - Using unfair means to earn Play Coins (such as duplicate accounts) is not allowed and may result in the offending user's Play Coins system being disabled and/or the user being banned.
SORCE: http://forum.3dspedia.com/pages/play-coins-for-eshop-codes/
After sighing up i recomend going to this thread and folowing its steps: http://forum.3dspedia.com/threads/quick-guide-to-3ds-pedia.11387/
Then going to this thread and folowing its steps:
http://forum.3dspedia.com/threads/the-adopt-a-newbie-project.13326
